jobDescription: Job description • Associate Media Director is a management position accountable for all aspects of their assigned client’s digital/DR campaigns. Has star qualities of Media Supervisor but with increased “ownership” of the client’s media services relationship and work closely with partner agencies at senior levels to set strategic tone for their accounts• AMD is responsible for managing a fast-paced digital planning and investment team – developing their skills, evaluating their performance and managing their growth• It is expected that the AMD will participate in new business pitches and other areas of importance at the department and agency levelResponsibilities:• Oversight on all aspects of client’s media services• Responsible for overall media objectives and strategies that fulfill client business objectives, as well as ensuring they are accurately represented when moving into the executional stages• Lead creation of all important plans and presentations• Demonstrate thought leadership and innovation for enhanced media plans and results, encompassing programmatic, social, and mobile attribution• Leverage media data to interpret meaningful performance learnings that can be applied to future media plans• Foster cross-agency relationships with account, strategy, production, and outside media and measurement partners• Train, motivate & develop Media Supervisors, Media Planners, Assistant Media Planners
